title: Amazon Black Friday deals go live: Echo Dot, Fire Stick, Blink Mini, Ring and more on sale
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score record-low prices on Amazon's best-selling devices
article: Amazon Black Friday deals are live, and yes, you read that right. The retailer just dropped a ton of new early deals on its best-selling devices, including the Echo Dot, Blink Mini, Fire TV Stick, Ring Doorbell, and more. The Black Friday deals event is the perfect opportunity to score an Amazon device on sale, and we're rounding up all the best offers for you below. Most of today's early offers include record-low prices, and we don't expect to see better deals during the official Amazon Black Friday sale.

Our favorite Amazon Black Friday deals include the Echo Dot smart speaker with a free smart bulb on sale for just $19.99, the Fire HD 8 tablet on sale for a record-low price of $44.99 (was $89.99), and the latest Ring Video doorbell marked down to just $41.99 (was $99.98). You can also grab the Blink Mini for just $19.99, and the best-selling Amazon Fire TV Stick is on sale for $24.99 - the cheapest deal we've seen.
